title: Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses, Android TV Smart Glasses with 360" Micro-OLED Display, Google Play, Media Streaming, HDCP Support & Cloud Gaming, Console, Android, iOS, Windows Compatible
descriptions:
Immerse yourself in a world of endless entertainment with the Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses! These Android TV smart glasses feature a stunning 360" Micro-OLED display that will take your viewing experience to the next level. With Google Play access and compatibility with Android, iOS, and Windows platforms, you can enjoy all your favorite streaming services like Hulu, Disney+, and Peacock.

But that's not all - these glasses are also perfect for gaming with cloud gaming support. And with TüV Rheinland certification for eye comfort and a diopter adjustment range from 0.00D to -6.00D, you can enjoy hours of use without any discomfort.

Stay connected with USB-C, HDMI adapter, and wireless adapter options. Don't miss out on the future of entertainment - get your hands on the Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses today!
